head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths LAFRIEDA, ANTOINETTE (NEE LUCENTI)

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths LAFRIEDA, ANTOINETTE (NEE LUCENTI)

block.p: LaFRIEDA - Antoinette (nee Lucenti). On July 29, 2000. Beloved wife of the late Patrick; loving mother of Antoinette Marie Wright, Lisa and Patrick LaFrieda; cherished grandmother of Patrick, Joseph, Michele, and Christopher LaFrieda, and James, Michael, Antoinette, Diane and Marie Wright; devoted great-grandmother of Patricia; dear sister of James and Frank Lucenti. Also survived by several nieces and nephews. Reposing 2625 Harway Ave., (corner of Bay 43rd St.) until Wednesday. Mass of the Christian Burial St. Finbar R.C. Church, 9:45 AM. Interment St. Charles Cemetery. For further information, contact Peter C. LaBella Funeral Chapels.

LaFRIEDA - Antoinette (nee Lucenti). On July 29, 2000. Beloved wife of the late Patrick; loving mother of Antoinette Marie Wright, Lisa and Patrick LaFrieda; cherished grandmother of Patrick, Joseph, Michele, and Christopher LaFrieda, and James, Michael, Antoinette, Diane and Marie Wright; devoted great-grandmother of Patricia; dear sister of James and Frank Lucenti. Also survived by several nieces and nephews. Reposing 2625 Harway Ave., (corner of Bay 43rd St.) until Wednesday. Mass of the Christian Burial St. Finbar R.C. Church, 9:45 AM. Interment St. Charles Cemetery. For further information, contact Peter C. LaBella Funeral Chapels.
